org.androidannotations.api.rest

Interface RestClientHeaders


  • public interface RestClientHeaders
    A @Rest interface implementing this interface will automatically have the implementations of these methods generated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCookie(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a cookie by name.
      java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a header by name.
      void setAuthentication(org.springframework.http.HttpAuthentication auth)
      Sets the authentication object.
      void setBearerAuth(java.lang.String token)
      Sets the Authorization: Bearer header as documented in RFC6750
      void setCookie(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a cookie by name.
      void setHeader(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Sets a header by name.
      void setHttpBasicAuth(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Sets the basic authentication user/password.

      • setHttpBasicAuth

        Sets the basic authentication user/password.
        Parameters:

        password - Password of the user

      • setBearerAuth

        void setBearerAuth(java.lang.String token)
        Sets the Authorization: Bearer header as documented in RFC6750
        Parameters:
        token - Token used for authentication
